text: Neoscopelus is a genus of ray-finned fish in the blackchin family Neoscopelidae. == Species == * Neoscopelus macrolepidotus J. Y. Johnson, 1863 (Large-scaled lanternfish) * Neoscopelus microchir Matsubara, 1943 (Shortfin neoscopelid) * Neoscopelus porosus Arai, 1969 (Spangleside neoscopelid) == References == # Froese, Rainer and Pauly, Daniel, eds. (2012). Species of Neoscopelus in FishBase. April 2012 version. Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Neoscopelus
